name: Shooting Over It
description:
Made under 3 hours for the Friday Night Game Jam 2020-36.

ControlsPistol RotationMouse PositionShootLMB (Left Mouse Button)Restart (don't take this as a button)R key

Music by TeknoAxe.

Art assets by Kenney (https://www.kenney.nl/assets/bit-pack).
